channel.title: Cache packing help
channel.description: can anybody link me to a tutorial or help me figure out how to cache pack newer items on a hybrid pvp client? ive been looking for a while still havnt found :/

item.title: Cache packing help
item.dc:creator: @Ty13r Ty13r
item.description:
@Ty13r wrote:

I THINK THIS IS HOW YOU DO IT!

Go into your client.java, then search "Models(); it should have a ‘//’ infront of it.
If it does remove it, however if you cannot find that then search

code void startUp() {
and under it add “models();”

DONT FORGET TO GZIP EVERYTHING IN THE RAW FILE!

Save, compile then run your client, it should then cache pack it…

Read full topic
